raw: (1) After I study a topic in math and feel that I understand it, I have difficulty solving problems on the same topic. (Disagree)
qtext: After I study a topic in math and feel that I understand it, I have difficulty solving problems on the same topic.

raw: (2) There is usually only one correct approach to solving a math problem. (Disagree)
qtext: There is usually only one correct approach to solving a math problem.

raw: (3) I'm satisfied if I can do the exercises for a math topic, even if I don't understand how everything works. (Disagree)
qtext: I'm satisfied if I can do the exercises for a math topic, even if I don't understand how everything works.

raw: (4) I do not expect formulas to help my understanding of mathematical ideas, they are just for doing calculations. (Disagree)
qtext: I do not expect formulas to help my understanding of mathematical ideas, they are just for doing calculations.

raw: (5) Math ability is something about a person that cannot be changed very much. (Disagree)
qtext: Math ability is something about a person that cannot be changed very much.

raw: (6) Nearly everyone is capable of understanding math if they work at it. (Agree)
qtext: Nearly everyone is capable of understanding math if they work at it.

raw: (7) Understanding math means being able to recall something you've read or been shown. (Disagree)
qtext: Understanding math means being able to recall something you've read or been shown.

raw: (8) If I am stuck on a math problem for more than ten minutes, I give up or get help from someone else. (Disagree)
qtext: If I am stuck on a math problem for more than ten minutes, I give up or get help from someone else.

raw: (9) I expect the answers to math problems to be numbers. (Disagree)
qtext: I expect the answers to math problems to be numbers.

raw: (10) If I don't remember a particular formula needed to solve a problem on a math exam, there's nothing much I can do to come up with it. (Disagree)
qtext: If I don't remember a particular formula needed to solve a problem on a math exam, there's nothing much I can do to come up with it.

raw: (11) In math, it is important for me to make sense out of formulas and procedures before I use them. (Agree)
qtext: In math, it is important for me to make sense out of formulas and procedures before I use them.

raw: (12) I enjoy solving math problems. (Agree)
qtext: I enjoy solving math problems.

raw: (13) Learning math changes my ideas about how the world works. (Agree)
qtext: Learning math changes my ideas about how the world works.

raw: (14) I often have difficulty organizing my thoughts during a math test. (Disagree)
qtext: I often have difficulty organizing my thoughts during a math test.

raw: (15) Reasoning skills used to understand math can be helpful to me in my everyday life. (Agree)
qtext: Reasoning skills used to understand math can be helpful to me in my everyday life.

raw: (16) To learn math, the best approach for me is to memorize solutions to sample problems.(Disagree)
qtext: To learn math, the best approach for me is to memorize solutions to sample problems.

raw: (17) No matter how much I prepare, I am still not confident when taking math tests. (Disagree)
qtext: No matter how much I prepare, I am still not confident when taking math tests.

raw: (18) It is a waste of time to understand where math formulas come from. (Disagree)
qtext: It is a waste of time to understand where math formulas come from.

raw: (19) We use this statement to discard the survey of people who are not reading the questions. Please select Agree (not Strongly Agree) for this question. (Filter statement)
qtext: We use this statement to discard the survey of people who are not reading the questions. Please select Agree (not Strongly Agree) for this question.

raw: (20) I can usually figure out a way to solve math problems. (Agree)
qtext: I can usually figure out a way to solve math problems.

raw: (21) School mathematics has little to do with what I experience in the real world. (Disagree)
qtext: School mathematics has little to do with what I experience in the real world.

raw: (22) Being good at math requires natural (i.e. innate, inborn) intelligence in math. (Disagree)
qtext: Being good at math requires natural (i.e. innate, inborn) intelligence in math.

raw: (23) When I am solving a math problem, if I can see a formula that applies then I don't worry about the underlying concepts. (Disagree)
qtext: When I am solving a math problem, if I can see a formula that applies then I don't worry about the underlying concepts.

raw: (24) If I get stuck on a math problem, there is no chance that I will figure it out on my own. (Disagree)
qtext: If I get stuck on a math problem, there is no chance that I will figure it out on my own.

raw: (25) When learning something new in math, I relate it to what I already know rather than just memorizing it the way it is presented. (Agree)
qtext: When learning something new in math, I relate it to what I already know rather than just memorizing it the way it is presented.

raw: (26) I avoid solving math problems when possible. (Disagree)
qtext: I avoid solving math problems when possible.

raw: (27) I think it is unfair to expect me to solve a math problem that is not similar to any example given in class or the textbook, even if the topic has been covered in the course. (Disagree)
qtext: I think it is unfair to expect me to solve a math problem that is not similar to any example given in class or the textbook, even if the topic has been covered in the course.

raw: (28) All I need to solve a math problem is to have the necessary formulas. (Disagree)
qtext: All I need to solve a math problem is to have the necessary formulas.

raw: (29) I get upset easily when I am stuck on a math problem. (Disagree)
qtext: I get upset easily when I am stuck on a math problem.

raw: (30) Showing intermediate steps for a math problem is not important as long as I can find the correct answer. (Disagree)
qtext: Showing intermediate steps for a math problem is not important as long as I can find the correct answer.

raw: (31) For each person, there are math concepts that they would never be able to understand, even if they tried. (Disagree)
qtext: For each person, there are math concepts that they would never be able to understand, even if they tried.

raw: (32) I only learn math when it is required. (Disagree)
qtext: I only learn math when it is required.
